name: elixir
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 10 PP for each move.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This medicine can restore 10 PP to each of the moves that have been learned by a Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This medicine can restore 10 PP to each of the moves that have been learned by a Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This medicine can be used to restore 10 PP to each of the moves that have been learned by a Pokémon.
